text: A snack is a small amount of food eaten between meals. It can be any kind of food that you do not eat in large amounts. People eat snacks if they are hungry between meals. For example, eating potato chips after lunch but before dinner is eating a snack. Other foods that can be eaten as snacks are fruit, candy, muffins, ice cream, and popcorn. Snacking has surged during the COVID-19 pandemic in the U.S. Now only a few people do not snack. Most snacks bought are processed foods. ==References== Category:Snack foods A snack is a small amount of food eaten between meals. It can be any kind of food that you do not eat in large amounts. title: Snack
